pr_title: CDPCP-2043. Remove groups that don't exist in control plane from IPA

timeline.bodyText: I think you could iterate the entryset, so you won't have to make a get() against the map
timeline.author: lacikaaa

timeline.bodyText: usually set methods don't return, I think builder pattern use the with naming convention
timeline.author: lacikaaa

timeline.message:
CDPCP-2043. Remove groups that don't exist in control plane from IPA

Groups that do not exist in the control plane at all can be safely removed
from IPA. The UmsUsersState has modified to include all WAGs so we can make
this determination.

Some protections were added to the FreeIPA client to prevent adding/removing
certain users that user sync should not touch. e.g., this prevents accidentally
removing the admin user or the admins group.

timeline.bodyText:
overall things lgtm, but I think this log could be moved into the calculate methods.
also isDebugEnabled is overkill I think, as we have debug enabled everywhere, and if we are planning to change that then we will have to revisit our logging anyway
timeline.author: lacikaaa

timeline.bodyText: this stream is not necessary I think
timeline.author: lacikaaa
